attributes.action: BRITISH TRUCK DRIVER "SOMEBODY IS GOING TO GET KILLED." It must be stopped.
attributes.additional_details:
BRITISH TRUCK DRIVER "SOMEBODY IS GOING TO GET KILLED."

"What are they supposed to do? they don't do this for fun, they do this to provide food and pay bills for their Families.
"If the French police are not prepared to do anything why are we not putting the British army to guard our border which starts here."
* There are estimated to be 9,000 illegal migrants camped out in France that want to go to the UK.

Over the last three years it's feared 27,000 have already entered the Uk illegally.
attributes.background:
BRITISH TRUCK DRIVER "SOMEBODY IS GOING TO GET KILLED."
They don't do this Job for fun 
"They are pulling trees and setting tyre's alight and things like that.
"It is a threat to national security in my opinion.

rejection.details: If you want the army to protect lorry drivers in France, we already have a petition open on that: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165191
